dependency.pip_show_slowapi:
Name: slowapi
Version: 0.1.9
Summary: A rate limiting library for Starlette and FastAPI
Home-page: https://github.com/laurentS/slowapi
Author: Laurent Savaete
Author-email: laurent.savaete@gmail.com
License: MIT
Location: /opt/homebrew/lib/python3.12/site-packages
Requires: limits, redis
Required-by:
dependency.rg_import_slowapi:
./requirements.txt:56:slowapi>=0.1.9
./api/middleware.py:83:        print("   ✅ Redis RateLimit: 분산 속도 제한 (429) - slowapi + Redis")
./pyproject.toml:11:dependencies = ["psutil (>=7.1.3,<8.0.0)", "slowapi>=0.1.9"]
./api_server.py:20:from slowapi import Limiter, _rate_limit_exceeded_handler
./api_server.py:21:from slowapi.errors import RateLimitExceeded
./api_server.py:22:from slowapi.util import get_remote_address
./api/middleware/rate_limit_redis.py:4:from slowapi import Limiter
./api/middleware/rate_limit_redis.py:5:from slowapi.util import get_remote_address
./api/middleware/rate_limit_redis.py:6:from slowapi.middleware import SlowAPIMiddleware
./api/middleware/rate_limit_redis.py:7:from slowapi.errors import RateLimitExceeded

sql_guard_400.body_head: {"error":"SQL injection pattern detected","message":"Request blocked by SQL guard middleware"}

metrics.body_head:
# HELP rate_limit_exceeded_total Total number of rate limit exceeded events
# TYPE rate_limit_exceeded_total counter
rate_limit_exceeded_total{method="GET",endpoint="/api/system"} 1
